channel.title: Writeups on Hi, I'm Sarel

item.title: THM Pickle Rick
item.description: This writeup goes over finding all three ingredients in the TryHackMe Pickle Rick room, without obtaining a shell Background There are three flags that we need to get. For this writeup, the IP of the victim is 10.10.79.234 Enumeration An nmap scan is run to determine the ports and services available on the machine nmap -sV 10.10.79.234 The results show that SSH is open, and that there is a webserver.
